yunxiao.authType.description: Authentication type: PAT (Personal Access Token) or OAuth (Recommended). Note: Organization ID is encrypted, use 'Yunxiao: Manage Organization ID' command to manage
yunxiao.oauth.clientId.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID (created in Alibaba Cloud RAM)
yunxiao.oauth.clientSecret.description: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret (created in Alibaba Cloud RAM)
yunxiao.pasteTarget.description: Paste target: commit (commit message box), cursor (cursor position), clipboard, input (input box)
yunxiao.includeTypeLabel.description: Include work item type label when pasting
yunxiao.includeStatus.description: Include work item status when pasting
yunxiao.includeLink.description: Include work item link when pasting
yunxiao.qoderTemplate.description: Message template for sending to Qoder, supports variables: {id}, {title}, {description}, {type}, {status}
yunxiao.traeideTemplate.description: Message template for sending to Trae IDE, supports variables: {id}, {title}, {description}, {type}, {status}
yunxiao.tongyiTemplate.description: Message template for sending to Tongyi Lingma, supports variables: {id}, {title}, {description}, {type}, {status}
yunxiao.copilotTemplate.description: Message template for sending to GitHub Copilot, supports variables: {id}, {title}, {description}, {type}, {status}
yunxiao.traeTemplate.description: Message template for sending to TRAE AI, supports variables: {id}, {title}, {description}, {type}, {status}
yunxiao.customAI.defaultAI.description: Default AI assistant to use when sending work items. Options: (empty - show setup guide on first use), qoder (Qoder - built-in AI), copilot (GitHub Copilot), tongyi (Tongyi Lingma), trae (TRAE AI), custom (Custom AI configured below)
yunxiao.customAI.extensionId.description: Extension ID of the custom AI assistant (e.g., 'GitHub.copilot-chat')
yunxiao.customAI.extensionName.descripti: Display name of the custom AI assistant (e.g., 'GitHub Copilot')
yunxiao.customAI.openCommand.description: VSCode command to open the AI chat panel (e.g., 'workbench.action.chat.open')
yunxiao.customAI.attachCommand.descripti: VSCode command to attach selection to chat (optional, leave empty if not supported, e.g., 'github.copilot.chat.attachSelection')
yunxiao.customAI.installUrl.description: URL to install the AI extension (e.g., 'vscode:extension/GitHub.copilot-chat')
yunxiao.customAI.template.description: Message template for sending to custom AI. Available variables: {type}, {id}, {title}, {description}, {status}, {assignee}, {priority}
yunxiao.branchNameTemplate.description: Branch naming template when creating new branch, supports variables: {category} (work item type), {id} (work item identifier), {title} (work item title), {date} (current date)
